meanings.definition: A flat cake made from batter and cooked on a griddle.
meanings.sent1: Mom made delicious flapjacks for breakfast.
meanings.sent2: The children enjoyed eating flapjacks with maple syrup.
meanings.sent3: The flapjack was so tasty that it disappeared in seconds.
meanings.sent4: The golden flapjack sizzled on the hot griddle.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of freshly cooked flapjacks filled the kitchen.

meanings.definition: A sudden loud noise or commotion.
meanings.sent1: The flapjack of thunder startled the dog.
meanings.sent2: The unexpected flapjack woke up the entire neighborhood.
meanings.sent3: The flapjack of the door slamming made everyone jump.
meanings.sent4: The flapjack of fireworks lit up the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The flapjack of laughter echoed through the room.

meanings.definition: A quick, sharp blow or movement.
meanings.sent1: He felt a sharp flapjack on his shoulder.
meanings.sent2: The boxer delivered a powerful flapjack to his opponent.
meanings.sent3: She gave the balloon a flapjack, and it popped instantly.
meanings.sent4: The sudden flapjack of the wind knocked over the trash can.
meanings.sent5: With a swift flapjack, he caught the falling book.
